channel.title: Rhiann McLean on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Fit for the Future in Argyll and Bute
item.description: RM - Rhiann McLean JR - Jim Robb JC - Jackie Connelly AA - Ann Austin RM In 2014, the Fit for the Future project worked with Argyll & Bute Council and local independent sector providers to explore new approaches to the commissioning of care at home. Fit for the Future is a joint Scottish Care and Iriss project which aims to inspire better outcomes for older people by working with independent sector providers.
